items.en: Not only code OOP for Java/Python/JavaScript, but also organize the Less/Sass efficiently in such a way.
items.ch: 对像化思维方式编写代码Python/JS/Java，并藉此将sass/less编译出高效的css.

items.en: I know how to markup HTML/HTML5 tags correctly and semantically. And I also have patience to play with WCAG standards.
items.ch: 能充分理解HTML/HTML5，并正确的使用他们。如果你对WCAG标准也有兴趣，我也能耐心的实现。

items.en: I use Webpack/Grunt/Gulp to manage/optimize front-end working process.
items.ch: 会使用Webpack/Grunt/Gulp来管理/优化前端开发流程。

items.en: Familiar with the CI/CD and also Container service like Docker, Real-time database like Firebase, MVC framework like Django/Laravel/Rails,etc.
items.ch: 熟悉国外的一些先进技术: Docker容器,Firebase云端实时数据服务, Django/Laravel/Rails的MVC框架.

items.en: I like responsive website and developing a lot of projects that use SVG/CANVAS.
items.ch: 喜欢响应式网站, 用过svg/canvas开发过一些项目。

items.en: I am also interested in AI and data science. Tensorflow, Numpy, Pandas...
items.ch: 在自学数据分析，Tensorflow, Numpy, Pandas...

items.en: Not only Front-end, but also coding at Back-end, perfer Python, interested in PHP and Ruby.
items.ch: 不仅仅前端，我也会写后端代码, 比较喜欢Python, 对PHP和Ruby也有兴趣。

items.en: Take care of cross browser issues that make me survive from 'IE6 age'.
items.ch: 我很注重兼容性，甚至IE6也难不倒我。

items.en: Fix bugs and write comments cautiously, respect the team works.
items.ch: 我明白团队的重要性，所以写注释, 修bug比较严谨。

items.en: I even design, both for web and print.
items.ch: 甚至会设计，不管是平面的还是数码。
